price: 17. Akorosey Yallay tamah inkih giney qibaada cakkisita Yallittey isin qibaadal agleh kaat haytaanay tu-gine waytah inna maay kinni? hinna, toysa Yallih nabna makassittaanaa ?qibaada kaah caglissaanamal.
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
